ActionInfo - Class in actions
This is the basic action information It tells how much it costs to play it, which targets are needed/forbidden, ditto for the previous actions having been played.

AmmoAmount - Class in actions.utils
This class represents a fixed ammunition amount, it can represent a cost or the amount available to the player
It is important that AmmoAmount be immutable
AmmoAmount() - Constructor for class actions.utils.AmmoAmount
 
AmmoAmount(AmmoAmountUncapped) - Constructor for class actions.utils.AmmoAmount
 
AmmoAmount(Map<AmmoColor, Integer>) - Constructor for class actions.utils.AmmoAmount
This method initializes the class by receiving a Map and checking that all the values associated with an element of AmmoColor are between 0 and the max
AmmoAmountUncapped - Class in actions.utils
This class represents an ammunition amount, differently from AmmoAmount this is not capped to 3 ammo per color All methods in this class are pure and return value should always replace the variable if an update is intended
AmmoAmountUncapped() - Constructor for class actions.utils.AmmoAmountUncapped
 
AmmoAmountUncapped(Map<AmmoColor, Integer>) - Constructor for class actions.utils.AmmoAmountUncapped

AmmoColor - Enum in actions.utils
This class will be used to represent the colors of available ammunition as well as the spawn points

automatic - Variable in class actions.targeters.TargeterTemplate
Some targets may be acquired automatically without the need for user input, for instance the Pawns occupying a tile where the user selects the tile and all characters inside are affected
